hero.title: The largest conference dedicated to freelancers
hero.description: Free and creative spirits who take their professional destiny into their own hands. Join Freelancers' Day, the must-attend event for ambitious and visionary freelancers in the Lyon region.

about.title: Welcome to the largest conference dedicated to freelancers
about.subtitle: About the conference
about.description: Free and creative minds taking control of your professional destiny. Join Freelancer Day, the must-attend event for ambitious and visionary freelancers in the Lyon region.
